se.options.title: < Options - Tap here to go back
se.options.audio.desc: Toggle some sounds and change the volume of things
se.options.lang.desc: Set the language of the game
se.options.volume.master: Adjust the volume of the entire game
se.options.volume.inst: Adjust the volume of the background music
se.options.volume.voices: Adjust the volume of the vocals
se.options.volume.hit: Adjust the volume of the hit sounds
se.options.volume.miss: Adjust the volume of miss sounds
se.options.volume.other: Adjust the volume of other sounds and the default script sound volume
